title: The Rage of Rageblade
body:
hahahahaaaa...god i'm clever.

enough of that, let's dive into the salty goodness!

so the problem with rageblade is, as far as i see it with my two sense, it's a bit too cost effective and it has a moderately broken interaction with sated devouerer. on so many occasions i've seen a jax or yi or most people who benefit from rageblade really, feed pretty badly but still come out even or even a little bit ahead in some cases because rageblade is so cheap compared to most other rush items and their cost efficiency. that on it's own would not be...too bad, still i'd be here crying my salty tears though! but on top of that, if you are unlucky enough to be up against a jungler like yi who can use rageblade and devourer at the same time then the hurt just doubled, literally. 

take a moment to enjoy how amazing my humor is HAHA god i'm great

anyway, theres three ways to "fix this" and by fix this i mean cave to my whining complaints and those of the others crying about this. because there is nothing more infuriating than winning, NAY, stomping your lane opponent thoroughly, and then you can't duel them because they finished their first item(rageblade) and even though your an item or two up on them you're still on even footing because of rageblade. it's....RAGE...inducing.

Phreak i blame you for making me this way.

so the 'fix' are as follows:

1) bump up the cost a bit to bring it in line, and nerf the damage slightly. i said slightly riot, get your finger off that button you used to gut Eve ! stop, no stop it, bad riot...*smacks you on the nose with a newspaper* bad. 

2) make Rageblade not proc on the devourer ghost hit, exceptions can always be made in any circumstance riot! don't be afraid to say all on hit effects other than Rageblade. you're big boys i have faith in you.

3) now stay with me here, we could fuse together devourer and rageblade. we could make rageblade the jungle enchantment to replace devourer, and thow in a bit of the kill stacks to buff your attacks even more at full stacks. so summary, axe devourer, remove rageblade, make rageblade a jungle enchantment, and at full stacks and full devourer stacks you get a rageblade. this one is wonky, but hell it's a thought.

4) all of the above :D because....reasons. wait if we do 3 then the others would....nah it's fine. 

and that's my post, a very sleep deprived salt induced post about why rageblade...makes me rage :D

replies.body: puh, i never read patch notes until they come out. like a man! and like a guy who is way to tired and lazy to do that shit after work lol

"all except rage blade?" It would only get replaced with what ever becomes the big AA item. (I mean last season, it was Devourer BotRK)

You probably would have had to make it so that it only proced on hit from champions, and not from items. That's the main reason why it was broke, because it scaled well with both Champion abilities, and other items.
also please let me know how many dislikes are from my horrible puns, and how many are because i'm a salty sailor. very curious :D
I think the dislikes are because both devourer and rageblade are already getting completely changed in the next patch and you obviously didn't read up on it before posting this.
Well, on the PBE, Guinsoo is going to cost 3600 and Devourer is being replaced with Blood Razor. I'm guessing the downvotes are over you making a post that is a bit behind the current information.

Jump to the league homepage and check out some of the changes coming with the mage update.  Devourer is getting deleted, rageblade is getting a cost hike of around 1k gold plus a big bunch of other goodness.  Red tracker has some the the discussion too.
